Name: Easyspeak Pre Prohibition Lager
Description:
Pale, crisp, sessionable. Reminiscent of a Pre-prohibition Pilsner, 
this light colored lager is made with 20% 
corn and Motueka hops.

Name: Hike On Helles Lager
Description: A classic German Munich Lager. Light body and delicate bready backbone married with a rounded noble hop character.

Name: Progress English Brown
Description: A traditional malty english style bitter with Progress hops.

Name: Pigtown Pride Porter
Description: A mighty complex and robust American porter that is finished with late boil addition Cascade hops that we love. Notes of chocolate and roasted malt.

Name: Ivory Shoulders Belgian Dubbel
Description: Collaboration with Suspended Brewing. Burgundy color and has deeply complex flavors with notes of dried figs, caramel, and honey. The aroma is full of fruity esters with hints of raisin, banana, dried cherry and clove.

Name: Liquid Hop Luck IPA
Description: American IPA/60 IBU - Copious amounts of Cascsde, Chinook and CTZ hops provide a healthy does of citrus, melon and pine.

Name: 912 Pale Ale
Description: 24 IBU - A soft and crushable malt bill. A healthy amount of resin, citrus and dank notes. Simcoe, Amarillo and Cascade.

Name: Golden Wisp Hefeweizen
Description: Traditional Hefeweizen made with 60% wheat malt. Notes of banana, citrus, orange and clove.

Name: Quartet Saison
Description: Named for the four different yeast/microbes. We designed this to be like a well balanced meal culminating many different tastes to deliver a refreshingly complex experience of hoppy, funk, tart and Saison character.

Name: Erised Flanders Red
Description: Sour, red wine like impression with intense dried fruit, red currants, plum, black cherries, clove. In Collaboration with Suspended Brewing who gifted us a two year old barrel filled with amber beer we blended with the Ivory Shoulders Belgian Dubbel malt bill and continued to age another few months before kegging.

Name: Arnold Palmer (NA)
Description: Our house made NA offering made with fresh squeezed lemons, black tea, honey and local mint.
